Package ws.weights

Class Weight<V,​E extends org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws.weights.Weight<V,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of the vertexes of the graph to be weighted.
    E - The type of the edges of the graph to be weighted.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PageRankWeight, SimpleWeight
    public abstract class Weight<V,​E extends org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge>
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a weight that can be applied to a scoring of a graph to produce a more complex scoring. Actually a Weight is a complementary scoring measure to be used together with another scoring measure. This class and its subclasses are thought and designed to be used with graphs of dataset DS1.

      • compose

        public static <V,​E extends org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> Weight compose​(Weight w1,
                                                                               Weight w2,
                                                                               double a,
                                                                               double b)
        Composes two weights to produce a more complex weighing for the graph.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The type of the vertexes of the graph.
        E - The type of the edges of the graph.
        Parameters:
        w1 - The first weight.
        w2 - The second weight.
        a - The fraction in which the first weight is considered.
        b - The fraction in which the second weight is considered.
        Returns:
        A composed weight of the graph.
